mapper.insert: insert into archive_exam_attend_log(id,user_id,exam_id,join_time,quit_time,status,score,is_correcting,create_time,update_time) select id,user_id,exam_id,join_time,quit_time,status,score,is_correcting,create_time,update_time from exam_attend_log where create_time between date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day) and curdate()
